thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: S.Korea says N.Korea could be behind hacking into Japan's Coincheck -Channel A

author: Reuters Editorial
title: S.Korea says N.Korea could be behind hacking into Japan's Coincheck -Channel A
text:
SEOUL, Feb 6 (Reuters) - South Korea’s spy agency has said North Korean hackers seem to be behind a recent $520 million cyber theft in Japan’s cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck, South Korea’s Channel A news said.
“The spy agency told parliament’s intelligence committee that North Korean hackers probably had hacked into Coincheck and stole 570 billion won ($521.44 million) worth (of cryptocurrency),” the news channel reported. ($1 = 1,093.1300 won) (Reporting by Dahee Kim; Editing by Paul Tait)
